RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT CLASS_CODE,CLASS_DESCRIPTION FROM OLTMS_CLASS WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND ONCE_AUTH='Y' AND CLASS_TYPE = 'RH' AND MODULE = ?

SELECT ROLE_CODE ,ROLE_DESCRIPTION,ROLE_TYPE,'NORM' STATUS,? FROM OLTBS_ACCROLE WHERE MODULE = ? AND ROLE_TYPE <> 'X' UNION SELECT ROLE_CODE,ROLE_DESCRIPTION,ROLE_TYPE,'NORM' STATUS,? FROM OLTBS_ACCROLE WHERE MODULE = DECODE(?, 'F', 'FC', 'T', 'LB', 'D', 'LB', '@') AND ROLE_TYPE <> 'X' UNION SELECT ROLE_CODE,ROLE_DESCRIPTION,ROLE_TYPE,'NORM' STATUS,? FROM OLTBS_ACCROLE WHERE MODULE = ? AND ROLE_TYPE = 'X' AND ROLE_CODE <> 'CUSTOMER'

SELECT A.AC_GL_NO, A.AC_GL_DESC FROM OLTBS_ACCOUNT A WHERE A.AC_OR_GL = 'G' AND A.AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND A.GL_ACLASS_TYPE <> DECODE(?, 'SI', '2', 'OL', '2', '*') AND A.GL_ACLASS_TYPE <> DECODE(?, 'SI', '3', 'OL', '3', '*')

RAD_DATASOURCES.RELATION_WITH_PARENT: OLTMS_PRODUCT_ACCROLE__RH.PRODUCT_CODE = OLTMS_PRODUCT_RTH_EXPR__RH.PRODUCT_CODE AND OLTMS_PRODUCT_ACCROLE__RH.ACCOUNTING_ROLE = OLTMS_PRODUCT_RTH_EXPR__RH.ACCOUNTING_ROLE AND OLTMS_PRODUCT_ACCROLE__RH.STATUS = OLTMS_PRODUCT_RTH_EXPR__RH.STATUS

RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT A.AC_GL_NO FROM OLTBS_ACCOUNT A WHERE A.AC_OR_GL = 'G' AND A.AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND A.GL_ACLASS_TYPE <> DECODE(?, 'SI', '2', 'OL', '2', '*') AND A.GL_ACLASS_TYPE <> DECODE(?, 'SI', '3', 'OL', '3', '*')

SELECT sde_id FROM (SELECT DISTINCT sde_id ,'A' FROM oltms_sde WHERE sde_id NOT IN ('OVR_DAYS','LOAN_STATUS') UNION SELECT DISTINCT (class_code || '_' || sde_id) sde_id ,'C' FROM lfvws_interest_class a, oltms_sde b WHERE a.module = 'OL' AND a.once_auth = 'Y' AND a.auth_stat = 'A' AND a.record_stat = 'O' AND b.sde_id IN ('OVR_DAYS') UNION select 'PRINCIPAL' || '_OVR_DAYS' SDE_ID,'B' from dual order by 2)
